unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Must say, heard mixed opinions from farmers in my village, Rampur. Some say Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is a lifesaver during floods, like the ones in Kerala. Others complain payout is too low – barely enough for biryani for the whole family after a bad harvest! Heard Ramesh uncle got only Rs. 5000 after losing his entire paddy crop. Onam celebrations were definitely muted. Hope things improve for next season. Maybe better awareness and faster claim processing would help?
